name: Fizik Antares R3 Open Saddle - Unisex
description: Lush and flexible, the Antares R3 Open Saddle blends performance with comfort. Its profile satisfies "Chameleons," riders whose flexibility varies and who alternate between supporting their weight on their sit bones and their soft tissues. The Open's cut-out makes riding more comfortable by removing pressure on soft tissues.K:ium rail is light, strong and provides a stiff connection between the shell and the seatpost.Carbon-injected nylon shell increases stiffness and power transfer.Open cut-out is designed to provide comfort in the riding position.Comfort Core foam is covered with Microtex for durability.
